org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom

Class SuperRecipeRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.SuperRecipeRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRegistry, ISuperRecipeRegistry

    public class SuperRecipeRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISuperRecipeRegistry
    This class allows you to register new recipes for machines.
    See Also:
    IRecipe, IRecipeInput, IRecipeOutput, IRecipeProperties, IMachine

    • Method Detail

      • getRecipeRegistry

        public <M extends IMachine<M,I,O,P>,I extends IRecipeInput,O extends IRecipeOutput,P extends IRecipeProperties> RecipeRegistry<M,I,O,P> getRecipeRegistry(M machine)
        Description copied from interface: ISuperRecipeRegistry
        Returns the registry that is responsible for all recipes of the given machine. If no recipe exists when calling this function, it will explicitly be created.
        Specified by:
        getRecipeRegistry in interface ISuperRecipeRegistry
        Type Parameters:
        M - The type of the machine.
        I - The type of input of all recipes for this machine.
        O - The type of ouput of all recipes for this machine.
        P - The type of properties of all recipes for this machine.
        Parameters:
        machine - The machine for which we want the registry.
        Returns:
        The registry responsible for all recipes of the given machine.

        Description copied from interface: ISuperRecipeRegistry
        Get the recipes for a machine.
        Specified by:
        getRecipes in interface ISuperRecipeRegistry
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • findRecipeByNamedId

        public IRecipeMatch<IMachine,IRecipe> findRecipeByNamedId(java.lang.String namedId)
        Description copied from interface: ISuperRecipeRegistry
        Finds all recipes who have the given named id.
        Specified by:
        findRecipeByNamedId in interface ISuperRecipeRegistry
        Parameters:
        namedId - The unique named id of the recipe.
        Returns:
        Returns the recipe whose named id matches the given named id.

        public java.util.List<IRecipeMatch<IMachine,IRecipe>> findRecipesByInput(IRecipeInput input)

        Parameters:

      • findRecipesByMachine

        public java.util.List<IRecipeMatch<IMachine,IRecipe>> findRecipesByMachine(IMachine machine)
        Description copied from interface: ISuperRecipeRegistry
        Returns all the recipes for the given machine.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • findRecipe

        public <M extends IMachine,R extends IRecipe> RecipeMatch<M,R> findRecipe(IRecipeMatcher<M,R> recipeMatcher)
        Description copied from interface: ISuperRecipeRegistry
        Returns the first recipe for which the matches() method of the given IRecipeMatcher returns true.
        Specified by:
        findRecipe in interface ISuperRecipeRegistry
        Type Parameters:
        M - The machine type.
        R - The recipe type.
        Parameters:
        recipeMatcher - A matcher that defines which recipes fit some matching criteria.
        Returns:
        The first recipe which matches the criteria, or null in case no such recipe was found.

      • findRecipes

        public <M extends IMachine,R extends IRecipe> java.util.List<IRecipeMatch<M,R>> findRecipes(IRecipeMatcher<M,R> recipeMatcher)
        Description copied from interface: ISuperRecipeRegistry
        Returns a list of registered recipe for which the matches() method of the given IRecipeMatcher returns true.
        Specified by:
        findRecipes in interface ISuperRecipeRegistry
        Type Parameters:
        M - The machine type.
        R - The recipe type.
        Parameters:
        recipeMatcher - A matcher that defines which recipes fit some matching criteria.
        Returns:
        A list of recipes that match the given criteria.
